name: Finding Relevant Relations in Relevant Documents
body:
### ECIR'16 Submission

This is the fully anonymized download page for the ECIR'16 submission "Finding Relevant Relations in Relevant Documents".
The data will be made public at time of paper publication.

### Evaluation Dataset

You find here the ground truth dataset for the query-specific relation extraction as described in the paper

* [Extraction correctness](data/sentences.tsv)
* [Fact relevance] (data/facts.tsv)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
